title: Total workforce of Red Bull worldwide 2011 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Number of employees, of value 11886.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Number of employees about 10410.0 was reached at Year 2014
